Question
========
What is the purpose of the Quarto Gallery?

Answerlist
----------
* It hosts Quarto installer downloads
* It showcases example documents and their source files
* It lists system requirements for Quarto
* It is a paid support portal

Solution
========
The Gallery provides examples and source files to learn from.

Answerlist

* False
* True
* False
* False
